main event: Major General Walter G. Farrell reported seeing a rapidly moving unidentified aerial object while standing in front of his home in Coronado, California on 22 July 1954.
interesting points: The object was reported to be proceeding in a southwesterly direction at an extreme speed unmatched by any known aircraft., The sighting lasted for approximately 3 to 4 minutes., The object was described as round, white, and luminous, about the size of an automobile tire., Major General Farrell, with 26 years of Marine aviation experience, had never encountered a sound or sighting like this before., The report was not taken seriously as there were no similar reports received, leading to no further action.
witness description: Major General Walter G. Farrell, U.S. Marine Corps, Retired
